summary: This mod removes the models of the craftable Jewelry, so they are invisible and won't cause any clipping issues with your armor, etc.
descriptionHtml:
Did it ever bother you, that all those necklaces and rings have clipping issues with your armor?
Well, it bothered me.

Because of this and the fact, that i was unable to find any mod which replaces the models of the existing jewelry, I decided to create my own little "mod", which removes the models of the craftable Jewelry.

Now they are invisible and won't cause any clipping issues. YAY!


[b][u]INSTALLATION:[/u][/b]

Install with NMM or drag and drop the .esp-file to your Skyrim data folder.


[b][u]REQUIREMENTS:[/u][/b]

None.


[b][u]KNOW ISSUES/INCOMPATIBILITIES:[/u][/b]

The player is able to wear multiple amulets and rings at once. Looking for the cause of the problem at the moment.



P.S.: I'm sorry for any possible grammar mistakes.
author: KleuTSchi
